text: Giuseppe Grabbi (; 12 February 1901 – 25 August 1970) was an Italian professional football player who played as a midfielder. He is also the grandfather of former Juventus player Corrado Grabbi. ==Honours== ;Juventus * Italian Football Championship: 1925–26 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1901 births Category:1970 deaths Category:People from Turin Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy international footballers Category:Juventus F.C. players Category:Novara Calcio players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Giuseppe Grabbi
